item.description:
Hello Canucks,

For June's meetup we'll be doing something new... We'll be heading over to the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum for their After Hours event. After Hours is music, art, conversation, cocktails and more in an inviting atmosphere.

Isabella Gardner’s palace takes on an otherworldly beauty after dark, when starry skies and moonlight contribute to its magic. Linger in the cloisters or around the courtyard, explore or sketch in the galleries, discover new exhibitions, revel in live music, sample the culinary fare in the Café. Join your friends at the Gardner third Thursdays for a new kind of night out. Cash bar but the atmosphere is on us.

For more information please check out After Hours

Bruce, an assistant organizer will be co-hosting this event with me and he will be at the museum at 6:30 PM. If you need to find the group give him a call/text at 857-221-2041 or me at 617-459-5145.

The cost to get into the museum will be 12 dollars.

Hope to see you on the 18th!

Thanks,

Andrew

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: we'll be in the front of the museum at 6:30 PM

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Something different in June - Gardner After Hours!
